meanings: (때·시기 등에 이르다) be, come, become; (나이가) reach, (formal) attain; (경과하다) pass
(동사적 명사에 붙어) become, get to be, be

examples.korean: Can I rely on your support in the election? 발음듣기 선거에서 당신의 지지를 기대해도 되겠습니까? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Can I rely on your support in the election? 발음

examples.korean: Can we take it as read that you want the job? 발음듣기 당신이 그 일자리를 원한다는 것을 액면 그대로 받아들여도 되겠습니까? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Can we take it as read that you want the job? 발음

examples.korean: Could I interest you in this model, Sir? 발음듣기 고객님, 이 모델을 한번 권해 드려도 되겠습니까? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Could I interest you in this model, Sir? 발음

examples.korean: Can we deduce from your silence that you do not approve? 발음듣기 당신의 침묵을 당신이 인정하지 않는다는 뜻으로 추정해도 되겠습니까? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Can we deduce from your silence that you do not approve? 발음

examples.korean: Could I move my visit to the following week? 발음듣기 제가 방문하는 건 그 다음 주로 옮겨도 되겠습니까? DARAKWON
examples.english: Could I move my visit to the following week? 발음
